important.title: SSH login
important.para: By default, &rootuser; SSH login in &productnameshort; is permitted only by using the SSH key. We recommend creating an unprivileged user during the deployment process that you can use to access the installed system. You can create an unprivileged user account on the first boot by using either the &combustion; or &ignition; tool. Creating an unprivileged user during system deployment is useful for accessing the &cockpit; Web interface as well.
